author: Staff Reporter
text:
Ramu (12), son of a daily wager, drowned in Upparu rivulet in Vettaikaranpudur on Thursday afternoon, said the Anamalai Police who have registered a case. The boy along with his relatives went there for a bath.

Probe sought

All India Democratic Women's Association has appealed to the Superintendent of Police to hold a direct inquiry into the suspicious death of a 17-year-old girl at Vellakoil in Tirupur. The girl was working in a textile mill and allegedly committed suicide. But, AIDWA members suspect foul play and wanted the matter to be inquired for possible sexual assault.

One held

The Thudiyalur Police have arrested S. Santhamani (45) on charges of peddling gajna. The police said that the woman was found in possession of one-and-a-half kg ganja.
title: Boy drowns in rivulet
